replies.author: akeicon
replies.txt_content: 鼠标移到村民身上显示名字好像是设定，中文名字的话需要装中文输入补丁，推荐InputFix

replies.author: mxxs
replies.txt_content:
你把config.yml里有一个name-regex设置选项，将内容替换为
name-regex: '[^\x00-\x1f\x21-\x2f\x3a-\x40\x5b-\x60\x7b-\xff]{2,25}'
